settings.title: EcoSmart Fire Tables
settings.subheading: Deciding which Ecosmart Fire Table is right for you can be a tough decision, especially when they all look great! The main difference between the options below is the burner size and placement.
settings.override_product_description_1: The Ecosmart Wharf 65 is the perfect way to add some warmth and atmosphere to your outdoor entertaining spaces.
settings.override_product_description_2: the Manhattan 50 is a versatile and functional fire table that will add a touch of luxury to any outdoor living space.
settings.override_product_description_3: Whether you're relaxing by the pool or enjoying a cozy courtyard evening, the Martini 50 is earthy design will help you feel right at home.
settings.override_product_description_4: With its flickering flame, The Cosmo 50 is the perfect way to create an instant focal point for your outdoor entertaining space.

settings.title: Ecosmart Fire Bowls
settings.subheading: What’s not to love about EcoSmart Fire’s fire bowls?! They’re stylish, eco-friendly, and affordable. The Ecosmart Fire Table Ark 40 was designed to spark conversations. Its cylinder-shaped will ensure everyone feels included. The Ecosmart Mix 850 Bioethanol Freestanding Fire Bowl and Ecosmart Mix Fire Bowl are exclusively fueled by bioethanol fuel so these bowls can be placed indoors or out. If you’re shopping for your client’s backyard project, then make sure to look at the Ecosmart Pod 40 Fire Table - this one is a crowd favorite amongst our commercial clients (contact us to learn more about our trade discounts!)
settings.override_product_description_1: The sleek and modern design of the EcoSmart Fire Table Ark 40 is perfect for entertaining guests or simply relaxing with family and friends.
settings.override_product_description_2: The EcoSmart Mix 850 is a functional and stylish table that will instantly become the focal point of your outdoor space.
settings.override_product_description_3: the EcoSmart Pod 40 is a versatile and functional fire table that will add a touch of luxury to any outdoor living space.
settings.override_product_description_4: The square-shaped Nova Fire Bowl is perfect for enjoying under the stars and its linear twist on a modern classic will brighten up any outdoor space.

settings.title: Ecosmart Ethanol Fireplaces
settings.subheading: If you’re looking for a fire feature to liven up your indoor space but don’t want to deal with the hassle of construction or installation, say hello to the Ecosmart Ghost Fireplace - manufactured to make installing a fireplace as easy as opening an Amazon box. Maybe you want something a little more integrated into your space… the Ecosmart Fire Flex Firebox Double Sided Esf.fx and Ecosmart Flex 68ss will transform your plain walls. Because they run off of bioethanol you won’t need to deal with the headache of obtaining permits or building a chimney. The Ecosmart Ventless Fireplace is one of our top-selling electric fireplaces - I mean, look at those colorful flames!!
settings.override_product_description_1: The Ghost Designer Fireplace has a minimalist design and sleek lines that gives it a modern edge, while its transparency allows it to fit into any color scheme or design style.
settings.override_product_description_2: If you're looking for a sleek, modern fireplace that will make a statement in any room, the Igloo Fireplace is the perfect choice.
settings.override_product_description_3: Whether you're looking to add a touch of luxury to your home or wanting to make a bold statement in your office or commercial space, the Fire Stix will not disappoint.
settings.override_product_description_4: Sleek, slim, and chic, the Flex Fireplace is perfect for modern spaces in providing a warm and inviting ambiance that is sure to make any room feel cozier.

settings.title: Ecosmart Fire Burners
settings.subheading: If you’re a builder or architect in search of burners for your next project, we’ve got you covered.  Turn your custom-built fire project into a usable fireplace in minutes with the Ecosmart Fire Xl900 and Ecosmart Xl1200.
settings.override_product_description_1: With no need for messy gas or electric hookups, this easy-to-use XL 900 Ethanol Burner is the perfect way to enjoy the beauty of flames without any of the hassle.
settings.override_product_description_2: The innovative XL 1200 Ethabol Burner is perfect for custom-designed settings, with its sleek, linear design and elongated flame.
settings.override_product_description_3: The EcoSmart BK5 is compatible with many different EcoSmart Fire designs, so you can customize your fire experience to perfectly suit your space.
settings.override_product_description_4: The AB8 Ethanol Burner is the perfect way to create a unique fire design in your outdoor fireplace.
